text: ï»¿Daigoji Temple is the most famous place for beautiful cherry blossoms.
Starting with the cherry trees along both sides of the entrance,...
...about 1,000 trees bloom in various places on the site for nearly three weeks.
It has even been called "Hana no Daigo,"...
...since Japan's second great unifier Toyotomi Hideyoshi...
...held an utterly luxurious hanami party here.
Daigoji Temple is definitely a must-see place...
